scripts.dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development concurrently --kill-others "yarn run react:dev" "yarn run electron:dev"
scripts.start: cross-env NODE_ENV=production yarn build && electron dist/main.js
scripts.release: cross-env NODE_ENV=production yarn build && yarn electron-packager . ElectronApp --out=./release --overwrite --prune --ignore=app  --ignore=src --ignore=webpackConfig --ignore=nodemon.json --ignore=README.md --ignore=tsconfig --ignore=.*.map --ignore=.*.ts --ignore=.*.log --ignore=.*.lock
